definitions.definition: The horny , translucent , mottled covering of the carapace of the hawksbill turtle , used as a veneer etc.
A domestic cat (or a rabbit, guinea-pig, etc.) whose fur has black , brown and yellow markings .
Any of several butterflies , mostly of the genera Nymphalis and Aglais that have similar markings.

main_definition: The horny , translucent , mottled covering of the carapace of the hawksbill turtle , used as a veneer etc.
secondary_definitions: A domestic cat (or a rabbit, guinea-pig, etc.) whose fur has black , brown and yellow markings .
Any of several butterflies , mostly of the genera Nymphalis and Aglais that have similar markings.
